area: 30-foot cone or 60-foot line originating from you or 10 ft. burst within 30 ft.
markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 403 4.0 **Bloodlines** [Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5), [Wyrmblessed](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=17) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 30-foot cone or 60-foot line originating from you or 10 ft. burst within 30 ft. **Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex or Fortitude --- You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 damage. The area, damage type, and save depend on the dragon type in your bloodline. ## Dragon Breath
**Dragon Type****Area and Damage Type****Saving Throw**
[Black](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=165), [brine](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=175)*, or [copper](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=172)60-foot line of acidReflex
[Blue](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=166) or [bronze](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=171)60-foot line of electricityReflex
[Brass](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=170)60-foot line of fireReflex
[Cloud](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=176)*30-foot cone of electricityReflex
[Crystal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=177)* or [forest](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=227)*30-foot cone of piercingReflex
[Green](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=167)30-foot cone of poisonFortitude
[Gold](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=173), [magma](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=178)*, or [red](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168)30-foot cone of fireReflex
[Sea](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=228)*10-foot burst within 30 feet of bludgeoningReflex
[Silver](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=174) or [white](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=169)30-foot cone of coldReflex
[Sky](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=229)*10-foot burst within 30 feet of electricityReflex
[Sovereign](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=230)*30-foot cone of mentalWill
[Umbral](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=179)*30-foot cone of negativeReflex
[Underworld](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=231)*10-foot burst within 30 feet of fireReflex
***Source** [_Mwangi Expanse pg. 76_](https://paizo.com/products/btq027ot)
--- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Dragon Breath

summary: You spew draconic energy from your mouth.
summary_markdown: You spew draconic energy from your mouth.
text: Dragon Breath Source Core Rulebook pg. 403 4.0 Bloodlines Draconic, Wyrmblessed Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 30-foot cone or 60-foot line originating from you or 10 ft. burst within 30 ft. Saving Throw basic Reflex or Fortitude --- You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 damage. The area, damage type, and save depend on the dragon type in your bloodline. ## Dragon Breath Dragon Type Area and Damage Type Saving Throw Black, brine , or copper 60-foot line of acid Reflex Blue or bronze 60-foot line of electricity Reflex Brass 60-foot line of fire Reflex Cloud 30-foot cone of electricity Reflex Crystal or forest 30-foot cone of piercing Reflex Green 30-foot cone of poison Fortitude Gold, magma , or red 30-foot cone of fire Reflex Sea 10-foot burst within 30 feet of bludgeoning Reflex Silver or white 30-foot cone of cold Reflex Sky 10-foot burst within 30 feet of electricity Reflex Sovereign 30-foot cone of mental Will Umbral 30-foot cone of negative Reflex Underworld 10-foot burst within 30 feet of fire Reflex Source Mwangi Expanse pg. 76 --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
